form.label: Shows
form.description: Information on how often shows have been run over the selected time period.

panel.title: Top Shows for Selected Time Period

search.query: [ rest /services/configs/conf-inputs | where 'eai:acl.app'="icecast_app" | fields index ] sourcetype=icecast-error event_type=source-log* | eval _time = relative_time(_time, "+5m") | eval hour = strftime(_time, "%H"), day = lower(strftime(_time, "%A")) | lookup schedule.csv time as hour | eval showname = case(day = "sunday", sunday, day = "monday", monday, day = "tuesday", tuesday, day = "wednesday", wednesday, day = "thursday", thursday, day = "friday", friday, day = "saturday", saturday) | append [ inputlookup schedule.csv | untable time day showname | fields showname | dedup showname ] | stats dc(eval(if(sourcetype="icecast-error", strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d"), null()))) as shows_run by showname | sort - shows_run | head 10 | rename showname as Showname shows_run as "Shows Run"

panel.title: Shows Not Run in Selected Time Period

search.query: [ rest /services/configs/conf-inputs | where 'eai:acl.app'="icecast_app" | fields index ] sourcetype=icecast-error event_type=source-log* | eval _time = relative_time(_time, "+5m") | eval hour = strftime(_time, "%H"), day = lower(strftime(_time, "%A")) | lookup schedule.csv time as hour | eval showname = case(day = "sunday", sunday, day = "monday", monday, day = "tuesday", tuesday, day = "wednesday", wednesday, day = "thursday", thursday, day = "friday", friday, day = "saturday", saturday) | append [ inputlookup schedule.csv | untable time day showname | fields showname | dedup showname ] | stats dc(eval(if(sourcetype="icecast-error", strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d"), null()))) as shows_run by showname | where shows_run = 0 | rename showname as Showname shows_run as "Shows Run"

| inputlookup schedule.csv | untable time day showname | join type=outer showname [ search [ rest /services/configs/conf-inputs | where 'eai:acl.app'="icecast_app" | fields index ] sourcetype=icecast-error event_type=source-log* | eval _time = relative_time(_time, "+5m") | eval hour = strftime(_time, "%H"), day = lower(strftime(_time, "%A")) | lookup schedule.csv time as hour | eval showname = case(day = "sunday", sunday, day = "monday", monday, day = "tuesday", tuesday, day = "wednesday", wednesday, day = "thursday", thursday, day = "friday", friday, day = "saturday", saturday) | stats dc(eval(if(sourcetype="icecast-error", strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d"), null()))) as shows_run by showname ] | fillnull shows_run value=0 | eval showval = showname.": ".shows_run." shows" | xyseries time day showval | sort time | eval time = time.":00" | fields time sunday monday tuesday wednesday thursday friday saturday
